name: GADTC Adventour Saga
description:
Welcome to the GADTC Adventour Saga.

A online Saga and Multiplayer game build for Alfonso's . This Game is educational mobile game that will educate student about the introductory of AlWay 1. In higher education, the use of mobile game-based learning via a smartphone app aims to create an engaging learning strategy that is acceptable and practical for GADTC AlWay 1 students of various majors to better their learning while experiencing GADTC's history. It's about a game in which we learn through a character named Alfons who takes us on a virtual tour of the campus together with the activities of AlWay 1-Introductory. In every week, there is an activity that is according to the course timeline that is being utilized in the game. The game is quite simple to play! Now it's just a matter of following Alfons' directions. By keeping users engaged in this game, we can stimulate their interest in our instructive game with colorful graphics.

Direct Link:https://www.mediafire.com/file/089jr0491poz3ae/AdventourSaga_Buiild176.apk/file?...

MOBILE SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS:

* OCTA CORE or Higher processor

* Graphics Vulkan | OpenGLES2 | OpenGLES3

* 4GB RAM | 6GB RAM Recommended

* 400MB to 500MB Storage Space

#Report Bugs to: https://www.facebook.com/ReckDev/
